About universAAL OSGi Integration Tests

The set of artifacts for building integration testing, where the full OSGi/uAAL stack is runned.

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
universAAL Support Integration Tests Framework Framework used for automation of integration tests for universAAL platform
universAAL Support Integration Tests Configuration Constants for confguration of Integration Tests Framework
universAAL Support Integration Tests Rundir Runtime directory of framework used for automation of integration tests in universAAL platform
